summary: A young girl lost in Shanghai is taken in by an American playboy and his girlfriend.
cast: Shirley Temple|Robert Young|Alice Faye|Eugene Pallette|Helen Westley|Arthur Treacher|Allan Lane|J. Edward Bromberg|Astrid Allwyn|Robert Greig|Jayne Regan|Julius Tannen|Willie Fung|Philip Ahn|Paul McVey|Helen Jerome Eddy|William Stack|Honorable Wu|Eddy Chandler|Lee Tung Foo|Chester Gan|Arthur Stuart Hull|Selmer Jackson|Richard Loo|Dick Rush|Layne Tom Jr.|Sammee Tong|Emmett Vogan|Beal Wong
title: Stowaway
